The Shrine of Seals

The Shrine of Seals was built by Hartmut after the Scouring. Its existence is not widely known, and its exact location is one of the realm's most closely guarded secrets. 

The full details of what is sealed within its depths are long lost to time. Whatever is in there must be important, or valuable... or dangerous. 

You could take a small group of trusted retainers and investigate the shrine, if you want to know for sure...
Yes, I have to know!
No, it must be sealed for a good reason.
The Girl

Your search of the Shrine of Seals has turned up some unexpected results. You have discovered a hidden chamber in the depths of the shrine. Inside the chamber, there's a young girl, lying on top of a raised platform. Although the room has been locked for a very long time, the girl is alive. In fact, she seems to be sleeping peacefully. \n\nThe room is covered in strange inscriptions, but your scholars have only been able to make out one of them. It's some sort of label, or epitaph, or warning, on the girl's platform. It reads "Demon Dragon."
Our savior is at hand! We have to wake her up!
The Demon Dragon is awakened.
I think I can find a use for her. Wake her up.
A demon AND a dragon? Kill her and seal this wretched hole.
The Demon Dragon is slain.
I'm not meddling with this. Close the chamber and let her sleep.
The girl found in the Shrine of Seals has been awakened, seemingly no worse for wear after her centuries-long sleep. She tells you that her name is Idenn, and her role is to create dragons for war.
Excellent...
Enigmatic Man

You are sitting by yourself late one evening. It's eerily quiet - the courtiers and servants who usually surround you are nowhere to be found. You're about to leave, but a flicker of movement catches your eye and you stop suddenly. 

Standing by the wall is a tall man in a hooded cloak as red as flames. You're sure he wasn't there a moment ago. The man speaks.

"For what reason have you awakened a demon dragon?"
Who are you?
That's no concern of yours.
I have only the best of intentions, believe me...
An intruder! Guards! Guards!
Enigmatic Man
The man is silent for a moment. The air around him seems to shimmer, as if he's radiating heat. \n\n"...Dragon," he finally replies.
I will give the world to your kind.
I thought we killed all of you.
Interesting. Just how did you get in here?
Back, monster!
The Last Dragon

I don't trust you, the man says. "And I am not convinced that you can deliver on that promise. Although if you remain the master of that 'object,' there is a possibility."\n\nThe man lowers his hood and looks you in the eyes. "[Root.GetTitledFirstName], my name is Jahn. I am the last true dragon in these lands. If your goal is to return them to my kind, you have my cooperation."
I look forward to working with you.
If you don't trust me, I don't want your help.
The man lowers his head, then disappears before your eyes. Your guards search the area, but report no sightings of the man or signs of a break-in. Was he ever really there?
Disturbing.
Liberation of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]

Humanity has turned [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName] into a cesspool of madness and evil. It is long past time to free that land from the wicked grasp of man and place it in the hands of a [Root.GetTitle] who can change it for the better!\n\nTo liberate it quickly, I could direct my commanders to plan an attack against all the rulers in the region at once.
We will strike as soon as possible.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] begins preparing an invasion of §Y[target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]§!. Rulers in the region may seek to join your cause...
We are not ready for this yet.
The Disturbance of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]

Our scouts have reported that [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] is preparing for war!\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName] is marshaling [From.GetHerHis] forces for an attack on all who call [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName] home. [From.GetSheHeCap] will likely begin [From.GetHerHis] assault within days...
This is our realm. I won't let you just do as you please with it!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will defend §Y[target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]§! against [From.GetTitledName].
If a force cannot be beaten, one must join that force.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will join [From.GetTitledFirstName] in [From.GetHerHis] invasion of §Y[target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]§!. After the war, [Root.GetFirstName] may be asked to rule §Y[target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]§! as a vassal of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
That [GetRootFromInsult]!
My commanders report that we are ready to begin our liberation of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName].

My commanders report that we are ready to begin our liberation of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]. We have also been approached by messengers from some of the rulers there. They are willing to fight on our side, if we allow them to govern the region after the war.
History will be rewritten.
At least their greed will make my task simpler.
\nAll other rulers within [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName] join the war opposing [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
The invasion continues, and [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] must keep fighting.
To victory!
Invasion of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]

[From.GetTitledName] has started an invasion of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]! [From.GetFirstName] appears to be focused on seizing the capital, but [From.GetHerHis] forces are attacking anyone who holds land within the region. [From.GetHerHisCap] reason for the attack remains unclear...
Madness!

The invasion of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName] has sparked heated debate in your court. Some of your courtiers have expressed the opinion that it is time for us to take a stand against [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]. We could demand that [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] cease this mad aggression, or face the full might of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
We must protect [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName] from [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].

[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will be issued a ultimatum to stop [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] invasion of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName]. If [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] declines, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will join the war opposing [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] shall remain neutral.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Your senseless aggression has gone too far! I am placing the people of [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName] under my protection. I urge you to stand down immediately and withdraw your forces. If you do not, you will face the full might of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. 

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Let that [GetRootFromInsult] come!
We cannot risk a confrontation with [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You have no right to issue such a demand. [target_dragon_liberation_invasion_title.GetName] must liberated from the pointless things that men fight over. Stand in my way and you will be swept aside with the rest of this world's evil. 

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Actually, going to war was not my plan...
